channel.title: Softlayer_container_authentication_request_openidconnect_external on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in Softlayer_container_authentication_request_openidconnect_external on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Authentication_Request_OpenIdConnect_External
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Authentication_Request_OpenIdConnect_External Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Container_Authentication_Request_OpenIdConnect_External data type contains information for requests to the getPortalLogin API. This class serves as a base class for more specialized external authentication classes to the SoftLayer OpenIdConnect login service. Local openIdConnectAccessToken Type: string openIdConnectAccountId Type: integer openIdConnectProvider Type: string securityQuestionAnswer The answer to your security question. Type: string securityQuestionId A security question you wish to answer when authenticating to the SoftLayer customer portal.
